DOC.brief_summary: To study difference single double bundle ACL graft cross-sectional dimension compare native ACL use postoperative 3-D MRI .
DOC.brief_title: Study Single And Double Bundle Anterior Cruciate Ligament ( ACL ) Graft Cross-sectional Dimensions
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator divide 100 patient ACL rupture 2 group . Group A undergo single bundle anterior cruciate ligament reconstruction ( ACLR ) . Group B undergo double bundle ACL reconstruction . At 3-6 week post operation , patient undergo 3-D MRI examination knee . The investigator reconstruct 3-D model reconstruct ACL native ACL , compare difference single double bundle graft .
DOC.criteria: ACL rupture patient age 10 50 year combine severe injury operate knee ( additional ligament rupture , major meniscus loss , patella instability , cartilage damage > 2Â° , pathologic leg axis deviation ) injury surgery contralateral knee inflammatory systemic disease , neuromuscular disease lower limb , recent knee infection
